text: Heng Fa Chuen is one of the 35 constituencies in the Eastern District. The constituency returns one district councillor to the Eastern District Council, with an election every four years. The seat is currently held by Wong Kwok- hing of the Hong Kong Federation of Trade Unions. Heng Fa Chuen constituency is loosely based on Heng Fa Chuen with estimated population of 18,597. ==Councillors represented== {| class="wikitable" |- !colspan="2"|Election!!Member!!Party |- |style="background-color: " | | 1991 | rowspan=4| Manuel Chan Tim-shing | Independent |- |style="background-color: " | | 1994 | Democratic |- |style="background-color: " | | 1996 | Citizens |- |style="background-color: " | | 200? | Independent |- |style="background- color: " | | 2011 | Stanley Ho Ngai-kam | FTU |- |style="background-color: " | | 2019 | Christine Wong Yi | Independent |- |} ==Election results== ===2010s=== ===2000s=== ===1990s=== ==References== Category:Heng Fa Chuen Category:Constituencies of Hong Kong Category:Constituencies of Eastern District Council Category:1991 establishments in Hong Kong Category:Constituencies established in 1991
